sn37.32:1.1: “Mendicants, there are five things that are hard to get for females who have not made merit.
sn37.32:1.3: ‘May I be born into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:1.5: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, may I marry into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:1.7: ‘Having been born in a suitable family and married into a suitable family, may I live at home without a co-wife!’
sn37.32:1.9: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, may I have children!’
sn37.32:1.11: ‘Having been born in a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, and having had children, may I master my husband!’
sn37.32:1.13: These are the five things that are hard to get for females who have not made merit.
sn37.32:2.1: There are five things that are easy to get for females who have made merit.
sn37.32:2.3: ‘May I be born into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:2.5: ‘Having been born into a suitable family, may I marry into a suitable family!’
sn37.32:2.7: ‘Having been born into a suitable family and married into a suitable family, may I live at home without a co-wife!’
sn37.32:2.9: ‘Having been born into a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, may I have children!’
sn37.32:2.11: ‘Having been born into a suitable family, and married into a suitable family, and living at home without a co-wife, and having had children, may I master my husband!’
sn37.32:2.13: These are the five things that are easy to get for females who have made merit.”
